summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3569, for the improvement of 12th Avenue South, from Weller Street to Lane Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44761, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
